title: How do I apply for PBE?
body:
How do i signup for PBE? Been a long time player and was really intruguied by the new assassin update and would like to try it out. Are the signups disabled? I try to go the website but it keeps giving me error:500 when i try to load the page. Would love some help 

Thanks

Heres proof http://imgur.com/MFqNwjw

replies.body:
This usually happens if there are issues with your route to that server. I suggest using a VPN such as [Cyberghost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/) or [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) as a quick workaround.

Let me know if one of those work for you!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xM5XHGcU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-19T04:45:17.153+0000)
>
> This usually happens if there are issues with your route to that server. I suggest using a VPN such as [Cyberghost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/) or [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) as a quick workaround.
> 
> Let me know if one of those work for you!

Thanks! The Cyberghost worked out fine and I was able to connect!

> [{quoted}](name=squido,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xM5XHGcU,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2016-10-19T18:43:24.115+0000)
>
> Thanks! The Cyberghost worked out fine and I was able to connect!

Oh yea sorry im on a different account if that was confusing xD
Just wondering if you have any plans to open PBE signups for other regions or if there's any method for me to apply on an OCE account without levelling a new account to 30.
How it works with Cyberghost on PBE?!
